20101221022923.000|20101221022925.000|CC1|FOOD.

20101221022929.000|20101221022930.000|CC1|THE POLICE THERE ROUNDED UP 12  
20101221022930.000|20101221022932.000|CC1|TERROR SUSPECTS TODAY IN WHAT   
20101221022932.000|20101221022933.000|CC1|SECURITY SOURCES DESCRIBE AS THE
20101221022933.000|20101221022935.000|CC1|MOST SIGNIFICANT ARREST IN MORE 
20101221022935.000|20101221022939.000|CC1|THAN A YEAR AND A HALF.         
20101221022939.000|20101221022941.000|CC1|ELIZABETH PALMER IN LONDON      
20101221022941.000|20101221022942.000|CC1|REPORTS THEIR TARGETS ALLEGEDLY 
20101221022942.000|20101221022951.000|CC1|INCLUDED CHRISTMAS SHOPPERS.    
20101221022951.000|20101221022952.000|CC1|>> Reporter: REPORTS SAY THE MEN
20101221022952.000|20101221022952.000|CC1|PLANNED TO BOMB MULTIPLE TARGETS
20101221022952.000|20101221022954.000|CC1|IN THE U.K., INCLUDED CROWDED   
20101221022954.000|20101221022955.000|CC1|SHOPPING AREAS AND GOVERNMENT   
20101221022955.000|20101221022956.000|CC1|BUILDINGS.                      
20101221022956.000|20101221022957.000|CC1|THE 12 MEN WERE ARRESTED IN A   
20101221022957.000|20101221022958.000|CC1|SERIES OF PRE-DAWN RAIDS IN FOUR
20101221022958.000|20101221022959.000|CC1|CITIES AROUND BRITAIN.          
20101221022959.000|20101221023001.000|CC1|THEY WERE AGED BETWEEN 17 AND 28
20101221023001.000|20101221023002.000|CC1|AND WERE MOSTLY BRITISH         
20101221023002.000|20101221023003.000|CC1|NATIONALS WITH BANGLADESHI      
20101221023004.000|20101221023004.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:30:00 of 1:00:00
20101221023003.000|20101221023005.000|CC1|BACKGROUNDS.                    
20101221023005.000|20101221023006.000|CC1|ALL 12 ARE BEING HELD ON        
20101221023006.000|20101221023008.000|CC1|SUSPICION OF TERRORISM.         
20101221023008.000|20101221023009.000|CC1|>> WITH THE CURRENT THREAT LEVEL
20101221023009.000|20101221023010.000|CC1|IN THE U.K. AT SEVERE AND WITH  
20101221023010.000|20101221023013.000|CC1|THE INFORMATION WE HAD I BELIEVE
20101221023013.000|20101221023015.000|CC1|THAT TODAY'S ARRESTS WERE       
20101221023015.000|20101221023016.000|CC1|ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY IN ORDER TO
20101221023016.000|20101221023018.000|CC1|KEEP THE PUBLIC SAFE.           
20101221023018.000|20101221023019.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WHILE VERY FEW     
20101221023019.000|20101221023021.000|CC1|DETAILS HAVE BEEN RELEASED,     
20101221023021.000|20101221023022.000|CC1|COUNTERTERRORISM SOURCES TELL   
20101221023022.000|20101221023027.000|CC1|CBS NEWS THAT THIS ALLEGED PLOT 
20101221023027.000|20101221023028.000|CC1|DID HAVE INTERNATIONAL LINKS AND
20101221023028.000|20101221023030.000|CC1|IT WAS INSPIRED BY AL QAEDA.

20101221023032.000|20101221023034.000|CC1|THE RUNUP TO THIS HOLIDAY

20101221023038.000|20101221023040.000|CC1|ISLAMIC TERRORISTS WERE PLANNING
20101221023040.000|20101221023041.000|CC1|AN ATTACK.

20101221023047.000|20101221023049.000|CC1|IRAQI SUICIDE BOMBER DETONATED

20101221023210.000|20101221023210.000|CC1|CARRY OUT TERRORIST ACTS ARE IN 
20101221023210.000|20101221023214.000|CC1|THIS COUNTRY.                   
20101221023214.000|20101221023216.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE PLOT UNCOVERED 
20101221023216.000|20101221023218.000|CC1|EARLIER THIS YEAR IS SAID TO    
20101221023218.000|20101221023219.000|CC1|INVOLVE THE USE OF TWO POISONS, 
20101221023219.000|20101221023221.000|CC1|RICIN AND CYANIDE SLIPPED INTO  
20101221023221.000|20101221023224.000|CC1|SALAD BARS AND BUFFETS.         
20101221023224.000|20101221023226.000|CC1|OF PARTICULAR CONCERN, THE      
20101221023226.000|20101221023228.000|CC1|PLOTTERS ARE BELIEVED TO BE TIED
20101221023228.000|20101221023230.000|CC1|TO THE SAME TERROR GROUP THAT

20101221023249.000|20101221023251.000|CC1|FALTERING ECONOMY.

20101221023412.000|20101221023414.000|CC1|FIRST RESPONDERS WHO GOT SICK   
20101221023414.000|20101221023415.000|CC1|WORKING AT GROUND ZERO AFTER

20101221023418.000|20101221023418.000|CC1|HELP WITH THEIR MEDICAL

20101221023431.000|20101221023433.000|CC1|JUST COVERED IN IT.             
20101221023433.000|20101221023435.000|CC1|>> Reporter: GRETA HELMKE'S     
20101221023435.000|20101221023437.000|CC1|HUSBAND ROBERT, A NEW YORK CITY 
20101221023437.000|20101221023438.000|CC1|POLICE OFFICER, SPENT MONTHS AT 
20101221023438.000|20101221023440.000|CC1|GROUND ZERO AFTER THE ATTACK,   
20101221023440.000|20101221023441.000|CC1|EVEN SLEEPING THERE COVERED IN

20101221023444.000|20101221023446.000|CC1|FOUR COLORECTAL CANCER, WITHIN  
20101221023446.000|20101221023447.000|CC1|SIX HE WAS DEAD AT THE AGE OF   
20101221023447.000|20101221023449.000|CC1|43.                             
20101221023449.000|20101221023451.000|CC1|>> PRETTY DEVASTATING.          
20101221023451.000|20101221023453.000|CC1|ESPECIALLY FOR SUCH A GREAT MAN 
20101221023453.000|20101221023456.000|CC1|WHO UP UNTIL THE END SAID TO ME 
20101221023456.000|20101221023458.000|CC1|"I JUST WANT TO GET BETTER SO I 
20101221023458.000|20101221023501.000|CC1|CAN GO BACK TO WORK."           
20101221023501.000|20101221023502.000|CC1|>> Reporter: 14,000 FIRST       
20101221023502.000|20101221023503.000|CC1|RESPONDERS ARE LIVING WITH      
20101221023503.000|20101221023505.000|CC1|ILLNESSES THEY CONTRACTED AFTER 
20101221023505.000|20101221023507.000|CC1|INHALING THAT SMOLDERING MIX OF 
20101221023507.000|20101221023507.000|CC1|PULVERIZED CEMENT, LEAD, AND    
20101221023507.000|20101221023510.000|CC1|GLASS.                          
20101221023510.000|20101221023513.000|CC1|THEY WOULD BE THE BENEFICIARIES 
20101221023515.000|20101221023515.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:35:00 of 1:00:00
20101221023513.000|20101221023517.000|CC1|OF A $6.2 BILLION BILL FACING   
20101221023517.000|20101221023518.000|CC1|ITS FINAL LEGISLATIVE HURDLE IN 
20101221023518.000|20101221023518.000|CC1|THE U.S. SENATE.                
20101221023518.000|20101221023519.000|CC1|>> THE FINISH LINE IS IN SIGHT. 
20101221023519.000|20101221023521.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE FUNDS WOULD    
20101221023521.000|20101221023522.000|CC1|SERVE AS A BACKSTOP FOR WORKERS 
20101221023522.000|20101221023523.000|CC1|WHO ARE SUFFERING FROM ONE OF 22
20101221023523.000|20101221023525.000|CC1|DISEASES IF THEIR HEALTH

20101221025133.000|20101221025133.000|CC1|       COPD makes it hard       
20101221025133.000|20101221025135.000|CC1|       for me to breathe.       
20101221025135.000|20101221025135.000|CC1|        But with ADVAIR,

20101221025138.000|20101221025138.000|CC1| So now, I can join the fun and 
20101221025138.000|20101221025141.000|CC1|  games with my grandchildren.  
20101221025141.000|20101221025143.000|CC1|           Great news!          
20101221025143.000|20101221025143.000|CC1|      For people with COPD,     
20101221025143.000|20101221025145.000|CC1|  including chronic bronchitis, 
20101221025145.000|20101221025147.000|CC1|       emphysema, or both,      
20101221025147.000|20101221025147.000|CC1|   ADVAIR helps significantly   
20101221025147.000|20101221025150.000|CC1|     improve lung function.     
20101221025150.000|20101221025152.000|CC1| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101221025152.000|20101221025152.000|CC1|  ADVAIR is different from most 
20101221025152.000|20101221025154.000|CC1|     other COPD medications     
20101221025152.000|20101221025152.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:51:00 of 1:00:00
20101221025154.000|20101221025154.000|CC1|       because it contains      
20101221025154.000|20101221025157.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20101221025157.000|20101221025157.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20101221025157.000|20101221025159.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20101221025159.000|20101221025159.000|CC1|        working together        
20101221025159.000|20101221025201.000|CC1|   to help you breathe better.  
20101221025201.000|20101221025201.000|CC1|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101221025201.000|20101221025204.000|CC1|  inhalers for sudden symptoms  
20101221025204.000|20101221025204.000|CC1|        and should not be       
20101221025204.000|20101221025206.000|CC1|   used more than twice a day.  
20101221025206.000|20101221025208.000|CC1| People with COPD taking ADVAIR 
20101221025208.000|20101221025208.000|CC1|    may have a higher chance    
20101221025208.000|20101221025210.000|CC1|          of pneumonia.         
20101221025210.000|20101221025210.000|CC1|       ADVAIR may increase      
20101221025210.000|20101221025212.000|CC1|    your risk of osteoporosis   
20101221025212.000|20101221025214.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.     
20101221025214.000|20101221025214.000|CC1|        Tell your doctor        
20101221025214.000|20101221025215.000|CC1|  if you have a heart condition 
20101221025215.000|20101221025215.000|CC1|     or high blood pressure     
20101221025215.000|20101221025218.000|CC1|      before taking ADVAIR.
